# Watchtower (Building)
## Overview
**Watchtower**

**Create** 35 Goods, 9 Influence, 25 Labor (1,470 gp) 

**Rooms** 1 [[Armory (Room)|Armory]], 1 [[Bell Tower (Room)|Bell Tower]], 1 [[Gatehouse (Room)|Gatehouse]] 

A tall structure that serves as a [[Guard Post (Room)|guard post]].
